# -*- CMakeLists.txt generated by CodeLite IDE. Do not edit by hand -*-

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.11)

project(Seventythree)

# Define some variables
set(PROJECT_PATH "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/Seventythree")



#{{{{ User Code 1
# Place your code here
#}}}}

include_directories(
    .

)


# Compiler options
execute_process(COMMAND 
    wx-config --cxxflags --unicode=yes --debug=no
    OUTPUT_VARIABLE
    CL_TMP_VAR
    OUTPUT_STRIP_TRAILING_WHITESPACE)
string(STRIP ${CL_TMP_VAR} CL_VAR_1)
execute_process(COMMAND 
    wx-config --cxxflags --unicode=yes --debug=no
    OUTPUT_VARIABLE
    CL_TMP_VAR
    OUTPUT_STRIP_TRAILING_WHITESPACE)
string(STRIP ${CL_TMP_VAR} CL_VAR_2)
add_definitions(${CL_VAR_1})
add_definitions(${CL_VAR_2})
add_definitions(-std=c++17)
add_definitions(-O2)
add_definitions(-Wall)
add_definitions(
    -D__WX__
    -DNDEBUG
    -D_FILE_OFFSET_BITS=64
    -DWXUSINGDLL
    -D__WXGTK__
)


# Linker options
execute_process(COMMAND 
    pkg-config --libs portaudiocpp
    OUTPUT_VARIABLE
    CL_TMP_VAR
    OUTPUT_STRIP_TRAILING_WHITESPACE)
string(STRIP ${CL_TMP_VAR} CL_VAR_3)
execute_process(COMMAND 
    wx-config --debug=no --libs --unicode=yes
    OUTPUT_VARIABLE
    CL_TMP_VAR
    OUTPUT_STRIP_TRAILING_WHITESPACE)
string(STRIP ${CL_TMP_VAR} CL_VAR_4)
set(LINK_OPTIONS ${CL_VAR_3})
set(LINK_OPTIONS ${LINK_OPTIONS} ${CL_VAR_4})
set(LINK_OPTIONS ${LINK_OPTIONS} -s)


if(WIN32)
    # Resource options
    execute_process(COMMAND 
        wx-config --rcflags
        OUTPUT_VARIABLE
        CL_TMP_VAR
        OUTPUT_STRIP_TRAILING_WHITESPACE)
    string(STRIP ${CL_TMP_VAR} CL_VAR_5)
    set(RC_OPTIONS ${CL_VAR_5})
endif(WIN32)

# Library path
set(CMAKE_LDFLAGS "${CMAKE_LDFLAGS} -L. ")

# Define the CXX sources
set ( CXX_SRCS
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/Seventythree/MainDialog.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/Seventythree/ConfigFile.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/Seventythree/MorseDecode.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/Seventythree/MorseStatistic.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/Seventythree/Main.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/Seventythree/MorseGUI.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/Seventythree/Global.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/Seventythree/Audio.cpp
)

if(WIN32)
    # Define the resource files
    set ( RC_SRCS
        ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/Seventythree/win_resources.rc
    )
endif(WIN32)

set_source_files_properties(
    ${CXX_SRCS} PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS 
    " -std=c++17 -O2 -Wall -pthread")

if(WIN32)
    enable_language(RC)
    set(CMAKE_RC_COMPILE_OBJECT
        "<CMAKE_RC_COMPILER> ${RC_OPTIONS} -O coff -i <SOURCE> -o <OBJECT>")
endif(WIN32)



#{{{{ User Code 2
# Place your code here
#}}}}

add_executable(Seventythree ${RC_SRCS} ${CXX_SRCS} ${C_SRCS})
target_link_libraries(Seventythree ${LINK_OPTIONS})



#{{{{ User Code 3
# Place your code here
#}}}}
